charges.charge_description: 26:7201 INCOME TAX/ATTEMPT TO EVADE OR DEFEAT TAX (1-4)

charges.charge_disposition: SENTENCED: 10/26/95, IMPRISONMENT: Count 1-18 months. As to Counts 2-4, 18 months, to be served concurrently with that imposed in Count 1 and one another. SUPERVISED RELEASE: 3 years, SPECIAL ASSESSMENT: 200.00 ($50.00 each count) (1-4)

charges.charge_description: 26:7201 INCOME TAX/ATTEMPT TO EVADE OR DEFEAT TAX (1-4)

charges.charge_disposition: SENTENCED: 10/26/95, IMPRISONMENT: 18 months as to Count 1. As to Counts 2-4, 18 months to run concurrently with one another and to the sentence imposed in Count 1. SUPERVISED RELEASE: 3 years, SPECIAL ASSESSMENT: $200.00 ($50.00 on each count) (1-4)
